title.rendered: Promovarea profesionala a afacerii tale peste 10 ani

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.3″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.3″][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.4.3″ type=”4_4″][et_pb_image src=”http://localhost/ppc/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/vvacrva56fc-scaled.jpg” _builder_version=”4.4.3″ animation_style=”zoom” hover_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.3″ hover_enabled=”0″]

Cat de mult dureaza instalarea VirtualBox in Ubuntu?

apt update
apt install virtualbox

Atat, doua comenzi si gata!
Avem acest minunat software package manager numit Advanced Package Tool (APT sau apt).
In lumea Ubuntu, APT conecteaza computerele la MII de aplicatii software open source.

Acum sa ne imaginam Ubuntu peste 10 ani!!!

apt update
apt install ProfessionalPromo

Doar doua comenzi si gata, ppc.promo primeste comanda ta si se ocupa de promovarea profesionala a afacerii tale!!!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
